sentence: That is what I believe in and that's what I believe that people of my state want me to do.? Rounding out the top half-dozen Democrats for fundraising in the Wisconsin race are Dr. Gillian Battino, a radiologist who supports Medicare for All, and Steven Olikara, a former nonprofit chief executive who backs legalizing marijuana and term limits.
author: John McCormick
title: Wisconsin's Field of Democratic Senate Hopefuls Is Lining Up on Left of Biden
